title: 新手list求評(for 3d modeling and rendering)

replies.msg:
會用 rhino vray autocad sketchup photoshop illustrator indesign, 基本上唔打機
對電腦有基本知識,想試下自己砌下機,list如下:

CPU: AMD – Ryzen 7 2700X
GPU: Asus – GeForce RTX 2070 6GB
MB: Asus – Prime X470-Pro
RAM: ADATA DDR4 2666 Unbuffered-DIMM 16GBx4 (Total 64GB RAM)
SSD: Samsung – 970 Evo 1TB
POWER: Corsair RM650x
CASE: Fractal Design Define C Window
MON: ASUS PB27UQ
KEYBOARD: Logitech CRAFT

有無D咩位係有更好既選擇?想將價錢減到18000蚊到
跪求各位巴打狠評,有錯請屌
Adobe 係咪 Intel 好啲？
